option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/Janilson Junior/Documents/weedingSite":"{\"/css/styles.css\":\"This file appears to be a CSS stylesheet that defines the styles for a website or web application. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather defines various CSS variables, global styles, and styles for specific elements and sections of the page. Here\\u0027s a summary of the main parts of the stylesheet:\\n\\n`:root`: Defines global CSS variables for colors, font families, and other styles used throughout the website.\\n\\n`body`: Applies global styles to the body element, including font family, color, background color, and padding.\\n\\n`.header-fixed`: Defines the styles for a fixed header at the top of the page, including a semi-transparent background, box shadow, and centered text.\\n\\n`.hero`: Defines the styles for the hero section of the page, including a pink background, centered text, and animations.\\n\\n`.countdown`: Defines the styles for a countdown timer, including the layout and styling of the individual countdown boxes.\\n\\n`.links`: Defines the styles for a section of links or cards, including the layout and hover effects.\\n\\n`.card`: Defines the styles for individual cards or links, including the image, title, and button.\\n\\n`.pix`: Defines the styles for a section displaying a Pix (a Brazilian payment method) QR code and key.\\n\\n`.footer`: Defines the styles for the website\\u0027s footer, including the text and border.\\n\\nThe file also includes several media queries to adjust the layout and styles for different screen sizes, as well as a set of CSS animations used throughout the page.\",\"/styles.css\":\"This file appears to be a CSS stylesheet that defines the styles for a web page. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather defines various CSS variables, global styles, and animations. Here\\u0027s a summary of the file:\\n\\n`:root`: Defines CSS variables for various colors and font families used throughout the stylesheet.\\n\\n`*`: Applies a global reset to the margin, padding, and box-sizing of all elements.\\n\\n`body`: Applies the default font family, color, background color, and overflow-x property to the body element.\\n\\n`.hero`: Styles the hero section of the page, including a pink background, centered text, and animations.\\n\\n`.monogram`: Styles a circular monogram element within the hero section, with a border and animation.\\n\\n`.hero__title`: Styles the main title in the hero section, with a script font and animation.\\n\\n`.hero__subtitle`: Styles the subtitle in the hero section, with a softer color and animation.\\n\\n`.countdown`: Styles the countdown boxes, including their layout, border, and animations.\\n\\n`.links`: Styles the section with cards, including their layout and animations.\\n\\n`.card`: Styles the individual cards, including their background, border, box-shadow, and hover effects.\\n\\n`.pix`: Styles a section with a QR code, including its layout and animations.\\n\\n`.footer`: Styles the footer section, including its text color and animation.\\n\\n`@media (max-width: 768px)`: Applies a media query to adjust the width of the cards on smaller screens.\\n\\n`@keyframes`: Defines various CSS animations used throughout the stylesheet, such as fadeIn, slideDown, and popIn.\",\"/index.html\":\"This file is an HTML document that displays a wedding invitation website with a countdown timer and links to the couple\\u0027s gift registries. It does not contain any classes, but it does have the following functions:\\n\\n`updateCountdown`: This function updates the countdown timer on the page every second, displaying the remaining time until the target date.\\n\\nThe file also includes some CSS classes that style the various elements on the page, such as the header, hero section, countdown timer, and links to the gift registries.\",\"/README.md\":\"This file appears to be a simple HTML document with a heading and a brief description. It does not contain any classes or functions. The file seems to be a simple website with links to gift sites.\"}"}
